title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and lowest at Teams Front Row Motorsports.
There is a difference of 161.0 between the maximum Teams Hendrick Motorsports and minimum Teams Front Row Motorsports.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Teamss.
Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Front Row Motorsports has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.

max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Teams, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Teams on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Teams Hendrick Motorsports and lowest at Teams Front Row Motorsports.
Second maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars is found at Teams Richard Childress Racing.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Teams Front Row Motorsports is 9.47% smaller than the maximum value at Hendrick Motorsports.

The Teams Hendrick Motorsports has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by Richard Childress Racing, and Joe Gibbs Racing. Down to the Teams Front Row Motorsports which is the lowest.
The Teams Front Row Motorsports tends to be 1.82 percent lower than average.
